poem:
### Holiday Spirits

In the amber glow of December,  
advocaat pours thick memories  
into our glasses,  
spiced rum whispers a sultry secret  
from a forgotten decade,  
while the clinking ice  
holds the retro notes aloft—  
a curated album of ghostly cheer,  
melting slowly into the seasonal hum,  
where joy lingers longer  
with each vintage sip.
